name: Monke Life Good
description:
DESCRIPTION

One Monkey, one gun trying to defend its family from hordes of fat & large pencils!

A FPS blended with a defend and survive! Rambo your way through 4 gruelling waves and defeat the final boss! Play it safe and shoot from a distance or get up close and personal and watch as the shockwave or your ground slam kills and sends your enemies flying away!
